traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Fabricate (1/Day)
entries: The dragon can cast {@spell fabricate}, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Desiccating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 49 (14d6 damage) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Essential Reduction (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon targets a creature or an object not being worn or carried that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 40 ({@damage 9d8}) necrotic damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it crumbles to dust.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):
